'''Iron nuggets''' are minimum pieces of iron that are used to craft various [[item]]s such as [[iron ingot]]s.  They can be obtained by [[smelting]] iron [[tool]]s, [[weapon]]s, or iron and chainmail [[armor]]. One iron nugget is effectively worth one-ninth of an iron ingot.

== Obtaining ==
=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|Iron Ingot
|Output= Iron Nugget,9
|type=Material
}}

=== Smelting ===
{{Smelting
|Iron Sword; Iron Spear; {Any iron tools}; {Any iron armor}; {Any chainmail armor}; Iron Horse Armor; Iron Nautilus Armor
|Iron Nugget
|0,1
}}
[[Durability]] and [[Enchanting|enchantment]]s do not affect the ability to smelt iron tools, weapons, or armor into iron nuggets.

=== Bartering ===
[[Piglin]]s may [[Bartering|barter]] 10–36 iron nuggets with a chance of ~2.13% ({{frac|10|469}}) when given a [[gold ingot]].
